quoteid.name: quoteid
quoteid.description: Unique identifier for the security quote.

type.name: type
type.description: Type of financial statement being reported.

fiscalyear.name: fiscalyear
fiscalyear.description: Fiscal year for which the cash flow statement is reported.

fiscalperiod.name: fiscalperiod
fiscalperiod.description: Fiscal period (quarterly or annually) for which the cash flow statement is reported.

enddate.name: enddate
enddate.description: End date of the reporting period.

currencyid.name: currencyid
currencyid.description: Identifier for the currency in which financial values are reported.

publishdate.name: publishdate
publishdate.description: Date when the financial statement was published.

cashfromoperatingactivities.name: cashfromoperatingactivities
cashfromoperatingactivities.description: Total cash flow generated from operating activities, including net income and adjustments.

netincome.name: netincome
netincome.description: Net income reported by the company for the period.

depreciationandamortization.name: depreciationandamortization
depreciationandamortization.description: Total depreciation and amortization expenses for the period.

deferredtaxes.name: deferredtaxes
deferredtaxes.description: Deferred tax expenses or benefits recognized in the financial statement.

noncashitems.name: noncashitems
noncashitems.description: Total non-cash items, such as stock-based compensation and impairments.

changesinworkingcapital.name: changesinworkingcapital
changesinworkingcapital.description: Net changes in working capital, including accounts receivable, inventory, and payables.

cashfrominvestingactivities.name: cashfrominvestingactivities
cashfrominvestingactivities.description: Total cash flow from investing activities, including capital expenditures and asset sales.

capitalexpenditures.name: capitalexpenditures
capitalexpenditures.description: Capital expenditures (CapEx) related to the acquisition or maintenance of assets.

otherinvestingcashflowitemstotal.name: otherinvestingcashflowitemstotal
otherinvestingcashflowitemstotal.description: Other investing cash flow items, including purchases or sales of securities.

cashfromfinancingactivities.name: cashfromfinancingactivities
cashfromfinancingactivities.description: Total cash flow from financing activities, including stock issuance and debt repayment.

financingcashflowitems.name: financingcashflowitems
financingcashflowitems.description: Total financing cash flow items, such as issuance or repurchase of shares.

totalcashdividendspaid.name: totalcashdividendspaid
totalcashdividendspaid.description: Total cash dividends paid to shareholders during the period.

issuanceretirementofstocknet.name: issuanceretirementofstocknet
issuanceretirementofstocknet.description: Net cash inflow or outflow from issuance or repurchase of company stock.

issuanceretirementofdebtnet.name: issuanceretirementofdebtnet
issuanceretirementofdebtnet.description: Net cash inflow or outflow from issuance or repayment of company debt.

foreignexchangeeffects.name: foreignexchangeeffects
foreignexchangeeffects.description: Foreign exchange effects on cash flow due to currency translation adjustments.

netchangeincash.name: netchangeincash
netchangeincash.description: Net change in cash balance for the period, calculated as total cash inflows minus total cash outflows.

ticker.name: ticker
ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol representing the company.
